onbon.y2.play

Class TextualizeArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • onbon.y2.play.Area
      • onbon.y2.play.TextualizeArea

  • public class TextualizeArea
extends Area
    The text area uses materials to draw colorful text.
    Author:
    ONBON
